H0.text: What is the capital of the French region of Burgundy. Lyon

H1.text: What is the capital of the French region of Burgundy. Auxerre

H2.text: What is the capital of the French region of Burgundy. Nevers

H3.text: What is the capital of the French region of Burgundy. Dijon

A4.text: Dijon is a city in and the prefecture of the Côte-d'Or department and of the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region in eastern France.

A5.text: The city is highly influenced by its position far inland in Northeastern France.
